mim.author: EAB/FJP/TA UABJOCL
mim.name: RsyncSynchronization
mim.description:
ECIM Transport Synchronization Model.
This is the root of Sync fragment.

enum.name: TelecomStandard
enum.description: Telecom standard of the synchronization networks.

enumMember.name: OPTION_I
enumMember.description: Option I synchronization networks for ETSI (European standard).

enumMember.name: OPTION_II
enumMember.description: Option II synchronization networks for ANSI (US standard).

enumMember.name: OPTION_III
enumMember.description: Option III synchronization networks for TTC (Japanese standard).

class.name: Synchronization
class.description: This MO class is the top class for synchronization management.

attribute.name: fixedPosition
attribute.description:
Specifies whether the node has a fixed position.
If the node does not move this attribute is set to true. A GNSS receiver may lock its position to enhance the receiver performance. If the node may move, for example on a cruise ship, this attribute is set to false. A GNSS receiver needs to continuously track its position.

attribute.name: synchronizationId
attribute.description: The value component of the RDN.

attribute.name: telecomStandard
attribute.description:
Specifies the regional telecom standard option to I, II, or III for ETSI (European Standard) , ANSI (US Standard) or TTC (Japanese Standard) respectively.
The attribute is not applicable, if RadioEquipmentClock::selectionProcessMode is set to QL_DISABLED.
attribute.dependencies: If this attribute is changed, the attributes RadioEquipmentClockReference::adminQualityLevel and RadioEquipmentClock::minQualityLevel will change to the quality level value defined within the telecom option.
